data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miranda, Gustavo Silva De, Zamani, Alireza (2018): Filling the gap of whip spider distribution in Asia: Phrynichus persicus sp. n. (Arachnida, Amblypygi), a new Phrynichidae from Iran. Zootaxa 4413 (2): 339-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.2.6|1 occurrence
